name: Auto-Generate Instagram Carousels with GPT-Image-1 & AI Captions from Google Sheets

user.name: Jorge Mart√≠nez
user.bio: AI Engineer & Full Stack Developer skilled in designing intelligent agents, workflow automation, and NLP solutions. Experienced with LLMs, Relevance AI, make, zapier, and n8n. Proficient in integrating AI and chatbots into web apps, optimizing processes, and leveraging automation for real-time productivity. Strong background in backend and frontend development, REST APIs, and database management.

description:
# üß∞ Instagram Carousel Scheduler

A tool to **automatically publish Instagram carousels** using a `Post Description`, `Instructions`, and the **number of images** you want to post ‚Äî all directly from a Google Sheet.
At the end of each post, the next row is marked as `Pending`, allowing **fully automated posting**, so you can prepare **months of content in advance**.
---

## ‚úÖ Requirements

* üì± **Instagram Business Account**
  Required to publish content via the Meta Graph API.
  Make sure your IG account is **connected to a Facebook Page**.

* üîê **Facebook Developers Token**
  Required to use the **Graph API** and publish on Instagram.
  üëâ It's highly recommended to create a **System User** so your token **never expires**.

* ‚òÅÔ∏è **Cloudinary Upload Preset**
  Used to upload generated images and retrieve public URLs.
  üëâ Use an **unsigned upload preset** (no API key required).

* üß† **OpenAI API Key**
  Used for:
  * Generating a **caption** from the post description.
  * Creating **image prompts**.
  * Generating images using **`gpt-image-1`**.
    ‚ö†Ô∏è You might need to **verify your business** with OpenAI to access this model.

* üìä **Google Sheets App with OAuth credentials**
  To fetch your content and instructions from the spreadsheet.
---

## üí¨ Notes and Customization

* ‚úèÔ∏è You can **customize the prompt** to change the visual style of the images.
  Examples:

  * *Gumball* style
  * *Comic-style illustration*
  * *Digital painting*

* üîÑ You can **replace Google Sheets** with tools like:

  * Airtable
  * Notion
  * Your own database

* üîê If Facebook requires a **Privacy Policy**, you can quickly create one here:
  üëâ [https://www.privacypolicygenerator.info](https://www.privacypolicygenerator.info)

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
